summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting underground and surface rights distribution easements over portions of Reserve No. 1, Brygger's Second Home Addition to the City of Ballard; Lots 5 and 6 in H.A. Raser's Addition to the City of Seattle; C.C. Lewis Donation Claim No. 37; C.C. Lewis Donation Claim No. 37; Lot 53, of Replat of Perkins First Addition to Richmond Highlands; Government Lot 1, in Section 12, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; Section 21 and 20, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Section 18, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Lots "A", "B", and "C", City of Seattle Short Subdivision No. 80-70; and Tracts 46 and 47, Brighton Beach Acre Tracts Addition the City of Seattle, and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
